# AsepriteSheet.Pixels property

Gets a read-only collection of all pixels that make up the image for this [`AsepriteSheet`](../AsepriteSheetType). Order of pixels is from top-to-bottom, read left-to-right.

```csharp
public ReadOnlyCollection<Color> Pixels { get; }
```
